root: ^The Witch: Oh, hello young man. It's rare seeing someone brave enough to venture this far.

ASK: ^Who are you? And what are you doing here anyway? It's very dangerous.
^The Witch: Me? I'm just an old woman, who came to this land a very very long time ago...
^The Witch: And what am I doing here? Hmm... let's just say that I can sense evil, and there are big dark magic waves coming from that church.
^The Witch: Tell me, young man. Did you comne all this way to give peaceful life before back to these townsfolk?
YES: ^The Witch: Good. Then I shall give you one clue. To resolve the incident, slay the man behinded all, he who revived the undead, he who brought these monsters here from the underworld.
^The Witch: Lastly, you should do what that Father cannot finish anymore.
^The Witch: That's all I've  got to say. Be on your way now, young man.
SHRUG: ^The Witch: Hmm, then maybe I'm mistaken afterall. I guess I must be getting old...
^The Witch: Then be on your way, I have nothing more to say.
